data.message: My notifications do not work. how is this possible? can you mean something to me?

replies.message: Hi Cassandra. We're sorry you're experiencing this. We want to help solve the problem as quickly as possible. You can learn how to report the issue here: http://bit.ly/2yFXZlY. -Tenaya
I have done this several times. and that does not help. I have already done 5 times. I hope you will do something about it as soon as possible

Cassandra Staelen me too. I’ve reported it a ton. So have quite a few people if you read through the comments. They need to fix the problem, not issue blanket replies. They haven’t even reviewed my problem submissions. 😡
